topic: Newbie question on displaying hours in 3D chart

replies.body: Hi Sawjam. Yes. You can use Ladybug_Average Data component to select filter data and just plot them between hours 9-5. Check this [Hydra](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Filter_Hourly_Data_By_Analysis_Period). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0qR8BrPZ-VZegOBIIbOPpaRhBHysdrNbNYRqqZc*f0szoQhG*T1Zz8XGTYQishyj*ZyTQCJxwUM0XTfEeVt-KGQHXgpckGEe/Filter_Hourly_Data_By_Analysis_Period_GH.png)
